body.p:
To his excellency Thomas E Bramlett
Governor of Kentucky

Your petitioner would respectfully represent to your excellency that at the last october term of the Hart circuit court one John B Dearen was indicted by the grand Jury of Hart county for murder for the Killing of one James Driskel by Shooting him with a pistol a certified Copy of Said indictment accompanies this petition. We further State that the Killing was done ^Entirely in self defense &^ under Such Surrounding circumstances as will not only authorise executive clemency but we believe the peculiar circumstances require it we therefore hope and humbly ask you to grant Said John B Dearen a pardon that he may be released from his present embarrassing condition and restored to his family
